{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2986171,"name":"Adam Fowler","username":"Adam_Fowler","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/adam_fowler/{size}/128864_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-07T20:34:43.055Z","cooked":"

In 2019, Practical Parts launched our Urethane Belt Welding Kits with the intent of bringing safe and easy belt joining down to a price that all robotics teams can afford:

Original Product Release Post

Our Website

Since then, we have made many minor improvements to our product lineup that I want to share:

  • Rounded handle corners - more comfortable to hold.
  • Rounded belt bed corners - easier sliding and improved aesthetics.
  • More marketing and SEO - some customers complained our products were harder to find than they should be (this post is part of fixing that)
  • Added the option to buy an uncoated heat wand for less money than the PTFE coated heat wand. Keep in mind the uncoated heat wand will sometimes retain molten urethane between jobs and get messy, so we recommend the PTFE coated heat wand if you can afford it.
  • Purchased raw material and components in bulk to guard against supply chain disruptions.

Purchase here: practical-parts.com
